channel.title: Best Pet You ever had
channel.description:
This thread is a simple thread for showing off your animals.
First, there is only 1 few rule to abide by. [code]1. The animal must have been owned by you at one point in time 2. It must be a REAL pet. Not a inanimate or a pixelated animal. [/code]
The separate "contests" include; Cutest animal, and smartest animal.
You can post a picture or a video showing the animal.
Here is my Old dog "Zeke" who died at the age of 3 1/2 due to some cancer bull shit. [img]http://i1130.photobucket.com/albums/m525/niggsalot/040.jpg[/img]

item.title: Best Pet You ever had
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:10, topic:437554”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=540260.msg3956280#msg3956280 date=1332791249]

@Wet Dreamss, it can do anything

Even things with… Peanut butter? If you catch my drift.

my pet rock.
i had it when i turned 5 and won a game of marbles.

How could I not see these coming… I can’t take half of mopar seriously x)

Not only that, we all followed his (1) rule

boom updated rules. xD

haha, I laughed at that. XD
How could the OP not see this coming? Moparscape is filled with trolls and 11 year olds (Ahram)

shhh
[/quote]
i feel like i got trolled, while trolling, didn’t notice it, then got trolled again inside of the last troll… (Inception troll)[/quote]
That’s an inside joke within a joke within a topic, within a thread, within in a website, within the internet, within the modem/router, within in the world, within the planet, within the solar system, within the galaxy, within the universe.

Read full topic

This thread is a simple thread for showing off your animals.

First, there is only 1 few rule to abide by.

1. The animal must have been owned by you at one point in time 2. It must be a REAL pet. Not a inanimate or a pixelated animal.
